oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oral history interview with John S. Bransford, Sr., 1980 July 09, excerpt 10
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Nashville investor John S. Bransford, Sr., conducted on 9 July 1980 by Leanne Thornton as part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. 1910-1935 Oral History Project. Bransford discusses his family's ownership of one of the first two Dodges in Nashville. The complete interview, as well an index, is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bransford, John Sterling, 1906-1984--Interviews
